## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/antidepbreaker">AntiDepBreaker</a></>}>
This class works in conjunction with the post-RA scheduler to rename registers to break register anti-dependencies (WAR hazards). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/antidepbreaker/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>
